messages.title: FOR STRAIGHT TALKING, COMMON SENSE POLICIES VOTE UKIP

leaflet.personalStatement: Serving in Her Majesty's Armed Forces for 34 years has given me a sense of duty. I will listen to your problems and look after your interests. Having served for many years on both Telford & Wrekin and Wellington Town councils I am aware of the problems we face in the Wrekin and I promise to tackle them head on.

politicalExperience.role: Member of Telford & Wrekin and Wellington Town councils

images.caption: Denis Allen smiling in a suit with a UKIP pin and tie

leaflet.additionalNotes: Printed by Printing.com@Runtime UK 1 Vineyard Road, Wellington TF11HA. Published & Promoted by Denis Allen, 10 Stokesay Road, Wellington, FT1 1JU
